code: @Test public void testSendMatchingMessage() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedBodiesReceived(matchingBody).     sendBody("direct:start", matchingBody).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Test public void testSendNotMatchingMessage() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(0).     sendBody("direct:start", notMatchingBody).     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
